p: Nigella damascena is an annual plant; its seeds are characterized by a strawberry flavor and unique aroma [ 111]. β-elemene ( Figure 8) was found to be one of the main components in the essential oil of N. damascena seeds and one of the compounds responsible for its unique odor [ 111, 112, 113]. Computational studies predicted that β-elemene can activate TRPA1 [ 114].
